snippet: Egyptian Army troops backed by helicopter gunships attacked hide-outs of Islamic militants in Sinai on Tuesday, killing nine and arresting 10, a military official said.
abstract: Egyptian Army troops backed by helicopter gunships attack hide-outs of Islamic militants in Sinai, killing nine and arresting 10.
lead_paragraph: Egyptian Army troops backed by helicopter gunships attacked hide-outs of Islamic militants in Sinai on Tuesday, killing nine and arresting 10, a military official said.

headline.main: Egypt: Military Attacks Militants for Fourth Day in Northern Sinai
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Military Attacks Militants For Fourth Day in Northern Sinai
